ItemTooltips.helm_of_iron_will: Gives you Armor and good Health Regen. You can buy 2 if you want, because you will turn them into an Armlet and a Dominator.
ItemTooltips.gauntlets: Early extra Strenght for more HP and to hit harder.
ItemTooltips.branches: Best item cost efficient for early stats. An Ironwood Branch ensures a Good Game.
ItemTooltips.boots: Boots are a really important item on Huskar. Buy them on the Side Shop.
ItemTooltips.flask: Dispels on damage, great consumable for fast healing.
ItemTooltips.tango: Doesn't dispel on damage. Great consumable to slowly regain health while in battle.
ItemTooltips.power_treads: This is definitely the first item you HAVE to get.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: No, I'm not joking. It is great if you want to help your team.
ItemTooltips.urn_of_shadows: Great item choice if you plan on ganking or participating a lot in teamfights.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: This item will improve your ultimate by greatly reducing the cooldown. It is a good item if you don't want to be just a killer but instead help your team to get the kills.
ItemTooltips.heart: One of the best items for any hero. Lots of Strength, HP, and Health Regen, you couldn't ask for more!
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: If the enemy team has lots of disables, this item is a great choice that will let you not only use your ultimate without it's downside, but will also let you right click them to death.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: Pretty damage cost efficient item, which will make you able to deal with pesky heroes with evasion.
ItemTooltips.armlet: Great item for Huskar, with a little pratice using its active, you will be hard to kill.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Make use of that Dominator of yours and turn it into a better item. Upon activation, you will get an insane Lifesteal boost for a few seconds.
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: One of the best items for Huskar. It will give you Lifesteal.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: If you aren't doing great and your team needs disables, buy it.

AbilityTooltips.huskar_inner_vitality: Heals more the more the target is wounded. It is great at late game, and not really good early game.
AbilityTooltips.huskar_burning_spear: Great for harassing/zoning/poking. It is a great skill early and mid game, not that useful late game. Remember to turn it off when you're on low health if you have lifesteal.
AbilityTooltips.huskar_berserkers_blood: The more wounded you are, the faster you will hit, and the more magic resist you will get.
AbilityTooltips.huskar_life_break:
Great spell for taking out single enemies or to extract some of your Health to get more stacks on your passive.

Despite people using it to initiate, ONLY do this if you're going against one. If you're in a teamfight, use this spell when you're half HP or lower, or else you will just kill yourself.
